name: NUMA
description:
NUMA is a horror game.

Something happened in the house, but what?

Player must find VHS tape and play it.

Each VHS tape contains a moment of an event that happened earlier.

The events found in the VHS tapes are so frightening that no one will believe them.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Additional mode :

*Last Stand* 

-Player most survive against creature.

-Items are always random.

You will die over and over again.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This game contains : Gore and Disturbing sound.

Windows 10

MAC

Linux

_____________________

1)Download the game

2)Extract files where you want them to be

3)Open NUMA.exe

Play with headset for a better experience.

This game is developed by 

CoDeN Studios
